channel.title: I cant use any clients!
channel.description:
i download them because the servers say they wont work right without it, and they dont. :mad: i download the .rar/.zip (depends on the server) and i extract everything. but for the .zip(s) all they have is a thing called "run" and when i click on it the command prompt that windows has pops up and closes in .03 seconds for the .rar(s) they have a whole list of things and folders but along with the "run" thing there is a "run program" thing also. the same thing happens for the "run" but for the "run program" the command prompt pops up but it stays up and it has some text telling me to go to a website that has nothing to do with the program.
i have the latest version of java and everything so i dont know what it could be :confused:

item.title: I cant use any clients!
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

I couldn’t really understand anything you said, bits and pieces. Fix your grammar and punctuation and I’ll get back to you.

Read full topic

i download them because the servers say they wont work right without it, and they dont. :mad: i download the .rar/.zip (depends on the server) and i extract everything.

i have the latest version of java and everything so i dont know what it could be
